comment: Yet another great semester w Bestie Vipp. Professor is kind, incredibly knowledgeable, and will meet you where you're at. Whether you're trying to be a fashion designer or go into marketing he has your back and will work with your skill level. Fair grading, very accommodating w family emergencies. He's so incredibly talented and his class rocks.

Professor Vipperman is an amazing instructor. He is very knowledgeable in all he teaches. He knows the ins and outs of textiles, is very supportive, and gives great feedback. He is extremely helpful and wants to see all of his students succeed. I definitely recommend taking his classes if you ever have the chance! I have taken 3 classes with him.

Prof Vipperman is really sweet and caring for his students- a very beginner friendly class to those who haven't before worked with textiles prior. class consists of 4 units- dye, knitting/crochet, embroidery, and a final that includes all 3. My only complaint with him is he gets a bit stingy about attendance, despite emergencies.

This textiles professor is wonderful. He is very understanding and lenient to all his students. He is always ready to lend a hand and help with anything. Extremely nice, definitely will be taking his classes again.
